entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS CollectionView renders wrong content in cell with GridItemsLayout #13753
  • Handler deprecation strategy #13752
  • Maui Build and render in emulator much slow #13750
  • ios binding project with xcframework fails to link #13749
  • .NET MAUI cant show up on the list of project #13748
  • Center VerticalTextAlignment on Entry doesn't work if it is initially invisble #13743
    Backlog
  • TableView inconsistent RowHeights per platform #13741
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Wrong sizing using Bindable Layout #13739
    Backlog
  • Navigation menu not showing in Blazor app if project name has space between #13735
    Backlog
  • Improve WebView cookie synchronisation #13733
    Backlog
  • Appshell navigation is not working as desired. #13732
  • Maui/Blazor Windows App crashes/won't start after being published to Windows Store #13728

Closed

  • Can't Install MAUI tools with MS OpenJDK preinstalled #12058
  • App.Current.RequestedThemeChanged never fires #11005
    Backlog
  • AppThemeBinding doesn't work on .NET7 #13627
  • Ticket: #11274 is closed before 2nd part of issue was resolved. Code snippet in ticket resolves most issues, but still leaves a sliver of previous page's view. #13718
  • IsVisible extension in IView #13678
  • UI freezing when performing frequent mouse action in different HTML input element in MAUI app #13573
    Backlog
  • [Windows] LineBreakMode doesn't work on Button #9277
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Fix the rest of the Color validating tests #11948
    Backlog
  • error XA4310: not found '$(AndroidSi gningKeyStore)' file 'myapp.keystore' #13576
  • Maui media picker on Windows Platform error #7660
  • iOS AppDelegate - Override for PerformFetch is not available #7957
    Backlog
  • [Entry] [Android] Cursor makes undesired jumps with masked behaviour #13571
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix iOS ListView Footer Missing (#13560) #13744
    community ✨
  • [C] Properly set SelectedItem and Index #13740
  • Reinstate WebView cookie functionality for Android & iOS #13736
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Merged

  • Remove space in fabricbot.json url #13751
  • Build maui.aar on CI #8943
  • [CI] Move the templates jobs to a yml template to be reusable. #13682
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
    backport/suggested
  • Cast to a less derived type on TabbedPageManager #13689
    area/TabbedPage, backport/suggested
  • Document ContainsKey behavior #13658
    area/docs 📓, area/Xaml </>, t/docs 📝
  • Use the launcher to start the Windows camera #13220
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Fabricbot backlog messaging #13737
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Essentials: fix share title on iOS #13708
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate.PerformFetch #7982

Updated

  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2.1 #13162
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Bugfix for text not properly aligned with radioButton when in RTL for Android #13610
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [Android] Don't cache the dynamic AppTheme and LayoutDirection values #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13703
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Windows] Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled on Windows SearchBar #13636
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `VisualElement.Background` #13656
    area/controls 🎮
  • We no longer need to reference BuildTools #13687
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #13599
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Change Windows WebView Cookies to CoreWebView2 #13518
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Fix Flyout and TitleView Offset Measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
